speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: Thank you all for joining today's session.
context: Sarah appreciates the participants for joining the meeting.

speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: I'm really excited to walk you through some of our newest features — the team did an amazing job bringing them to life.
context: Sarah appreciates her product team's work while introducing the demo.

speaker: Rachel Patel
quote: I really like that. One challenge we've had is that our customer service teams sometimes feel disconnected from the impact they're making. This direct line from customers could be transformative.
context: Rachel praises the feature for empowering employees and encouraging appreciation from customers.

speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: And our research shows that customer recognition increases engagement by ten times.
context: Sarah highlights the impact of customer recognition on employee engagement.

speaker: James Rodriguez
quote: What makes this powerful is the visibility. Our data shows that 70% of employees haven't been recognized in the last 30 days. Post a Win democratizes recognition and creates a continuous stream of positive moments.
context: James praises the Post a Win feature for its ability to increase visibility and recognition.

speaker: Rachel Patel
quote: That's powerful for culture building. Can we track which leaders are actively using these features? We're trying to build recognition into our leadership competency model.
context: Rachel appreciates the leadership dashboard feature for tracking leader engagement.

speaker: James Rodriguez
quote: Here's an example. An employee received customer recognition through Say Thanks. Her manager saw it and boosted it with additional points and a personal message. Then colleagues added their own boosts. What started as a single recognition moment became a wave of support.
context: James highlights the impact of the Boost feature on creating a supportive work environment.

speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: This is exactly why we built 'Manager Store.' Eighty percent of the global workforce is deskless, and traditional digital recognition often doesn't reach them effectively.
context: Sarah appreciates the Manager Store feature for its ability to recognize deskless workers.

speaker: Rachel Patel
quote: We've actually been talking about doing something like this. Can we customize the product selection?
context: Rachel praises the Company Store feature for its customization options.

speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: We do. Organizations using Say Thanks report 10x increases in engagement scores specifically for customer-facing teams. With Post a Win and Broadcast, we're seeing 40-60% increases in recognition frequency across organizations.
context: Sarah highlights the impact of the features on employee engagement.

speaker: Emma Thompson
quote: Absolutely. I'll send that over today along with implementation timelines and pricing details for the new features.
context: Emma appreciates the opportunity to provide additional information.

speaker: Rachel Patel
quote: Yes, I think that would be valuable. We've been exploring more holistic benefits approaches.
context: Rachel praises the LSA feature for its holistic approach to benefits.

speaker: Michael Chen
quote: I want to raise a couple of feature requests that would be specifically valuable for GlobalTech. First, we have a global workforce across 45 countries. Is there any way to incorporate local holidays and cultural celebrations into the recognition calendar?
context: Michael appreciates the opportunity to provide feedback and requests a feature to incorporate local holidays.

speaker: Sarah Mitchell
quote: I love that. That's going into our roadmap discussions.
context: Sarah appreciates Michael's feedback and incorporates it into the roadmap discussions.

speaker: Rachel Patel
quote: I'm most excited about Manager Store. That's going to be a game-changer for our field operations. I also think Say Thanks could transform how our customer service teams feel about their work.
context: Rachel praises the Manager Store and Say Thanks features for their potential impact on employee engagement.

speaker: Michael Chen
quote: What I appreciate is how these features create a recognition ecosystem. They build on each other—Post a Win feeds into Broadcast, which can be boosted, which creates visibility that drives more recognition.
context: Michael appreciates the comprehensive approach to recognition and the interconnectedness of the features.

speaker: James Rodriguez
quote: Just that it's been a pleasure, and I'm looking forward to seeing these features in action at GlobalTech. The energy and thoughtfulness you bring to employee experience really comes through.
context: James appreciates the opportunity to work with GlobalTech and praises their approach to employee experience.

speaker: Emma Thompson
quote: Agreed. Thanks, everyone. I'll have those materials to you by end of day today.
context: Emma appreciates the opportunity to provide additional information and thanks the participants.
